item.title: 多米诺澳大利亚公司股价下跌，首席执行官计划一年后离职
item.description: 多米诺比萨企业有限公司（Domino's Pizza Enterprises Ltd.）表示，集团首席执行官兼董事总经理马克-范戴克（Mark van Dyck）将在任职仅一年后卸任，公司股价跌至2014年以来的最低点。【原文：Shares of Domino’s Pizza Enterprises Ltd. tumbled to their lowest since 2014 after the company said Group Chief Executive Officer and Managing Director Mark van Dyck will step down after just one year in the role.】

item.title: 软银的 Ampere 交易现在面临美国联邦贸易委员会更深入的审查
item.description: 软银集团收购半导体设计公司 Ampere Computing LLC 的交易可能面临美国政府的长期调查。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s acquisition of semiconductor designer Ampere Computing LLC is facing a potentially lengthy probe by the US government.】

item.title: 特朗普税收法案引发美国财政赤字担忧，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 参议院通过唐纳德-特朗普总统数万亿美元的税收法案后，投资者对美国财政状况的担忧加重，黄金保持上涨。【原文：Gold held an advance, with investors weighing concerns about the US fiscal position after the Senate passed President Donald Trump’s multitrillion-dollar tax bill.】

item.title: 美国巩固领先地位，敦促中国拥抱稳定币
item.description: 随着美国通过加密技术巩固美元的主导地位，政策顾问和经济学家越来越多地呼吁中国探索使用稳定币进行跨境支付。【原文：China faces growing calls from policy advisers and economists to explore using stablecoins for cross-border payments, as the US moves to entrench the dollar’s dominance through crypto technology.】

item.title: 影子贷款机构建屋发展局将在 2025 年印度最大首次公开募股后首次亮相
item.description: 印度建屋发展银行金融服务有限公司（HDB Financial Services Ltd.）的股票将于周三在孟买开始交易，此前这家影子贷款公司首次公开发行了1,250亿卢比（15亿美元）的股票，吸引了投资者的强烈需求。【原文：Shares of HDB Financial Services Ltd. will start trading in Mumbai on Wednesday after the shadow lender’s 125 billion-rupee ($1.5 billion) initial public offering — India’s biggest this year — attracted strong demand from investors.】

item.title: 印度央行小组可能建议印度保留 4% 的通胀目标
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度储备银行的一个内部委员会赞成在即将进行的政府审查中保留当前的通胀目标，这让投资者对货币政策的连续性吃了一颗定心丸。【原文：An internal committee of the Reserve Bank of India is in favor of retaining the current inflation target in an upcoming government review, according to people familiar with the matter, giving investors some reassurance about the continuity of monetary policy.】

item.title: 澳航称 "重大 "网络攻击以乘客数据为目标
item.description: 澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways Ltd.）预计，在针对其一个联络中心的网络攻击中，"大量 "客户数据被盗。【原文：Qantas Airways Ltd. expects that a “significant” amount of customer data was stolen by a cyberattack targeting one of its contact centers.】

item.title: Scale AI 首席执行官在 Meta 交易后强调初创公司的独立性
item.description: Scale AI 的新任领导者表示，尽管几周前社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 公司刚刚收购了该公司 49% 的股份，但这家数据标签初创公司仍然独立于 Meta Platforms 公司，并专注于拓展业务。【原文：Scale AI’s new leader said the data-labeling startup remains independent from Meta Platforms Inc. despite the social media giant taking a 49% stake just weeks ago, and is focused on expanding its business.】

item.title: 现代汽车新建研究实验室，更加注重用户体验
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co. Ltd.）在首尔推出了一个新的展厅和研究实验室，以此加深对驾驶者如何体验汽车的了解，这也是该公司将下一代软件植入汽车的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. is deepening its push into understanding how drivers experience vehicles with the launch of a new showroom and research lab in Seoul, part of a broader effort to embed next-generation software into its cars.】

item.title: 中东局势紧张，美国库存成为焦点，石油保持涨势
item.description: 在中东紧张局势和美国库存成为关注焦点的情况下，石油价格在小幅上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after a modest advance with tensions in the Middle East and US inventories in focus.】

item.title: 关税风险考验亚洲强劲的七月业绩记录
item.description: 由于关税和宏观经济忧虑打压了市场情绪，今年 7 月亚洲股市的季节性升势可能会减弱。【原文：A seasonal lift for Asian equities in July may falter this year as tariff and macroeconomic concerns dampen sentiment.】

item.title: 秘鲁铜矿运输因非正规矿工封锁道路而中断
item.description: 知情人士称，非正式矿工设置的路障正在干扰秘鲁一些矿场的铜矿运输，其中包括 MMG Ltd. 和赫德贝矿业公司（Hudbay Minerals Inc.【原文：Roadblocks by informal miners are disrupting transport of copper from some mines in Peru, including those owned by MMG Ltd. and Hudbay Minerals Inc., said people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 谷歌结束食谱试点，创作者担心网络流量受冲击
item.description: 谷歌已经结束了一项功能的测试，该功能可以让用户直接在网页搜索结果中打开烹饪食谱内容的快照。【原文：Google has ended tests of a feature that would have let users open a snapshot of cooking-recipe content directly in web search results — a welcome development for creators and food bloggers who were concerned about eroding traffic to their sites.】

item.title: 日本股市因特朗普威胁而进一步下跌：市场综述
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普再次威胁要对日本加征关税，并排除了推迟7月9日对贸易伙伴恢复征收更高关税的最后期限的可能性，东京股市有望延续跌势。【原文：Tokyo stocks were poised to extend losses after Donald Trump renewed threats to hike tariffs on Japan and ruled out delaying the July 9 deadline for resuming higher levies on trading partners.】

item.title: 固定汇率区间再遭考验，香港加强捍卫外汇联系汇率制
item.description: 香港事实上的中央银行加大了对港币的购买力度，试图捍卫因美元波动而紧张的联系汇率。【原文：Hong Kong’s de-facto central bank ramped up purchases of the city’s currency as it sought to defend a peg that has been strained by volatility in the greenback.】

item.title: 谷歌因滥用安卓手机数据欠款 3.14 亿美元
item.description: 加利福尼亚州的一个陪审团要求谷歌支付 3.14 亿美元，因为有人声称谷歌在安卓用户不知情的情况下非法使用他们的手机数据收集信息。【原文：Google was told by a California jury to pay $314 million over claims that it illegally used Android users’ cellular data to collect information without their knowledge.】

item.title: 被解雇的野村交易员用 "厕所涂鸦 "为自己辩护
item.description:
因恶搞而丢掉工作后，泽田在东京的一家咖啡馆里进行股票交易 

After losing his job for spoofing, Sawada trades stocks out of a cafe in Tokyo

item.title: 什么是港元联系汇率制，为何引起如此大的轰动？
item.description: 自 1983 年与美元挂钩以来，港元通常是一种沉闷的货币。除非它不沉闷，比如今年。【原文：Pegged to the US dollar since 1983, the Hong Kong dollar is usually a dull currency. Except when it’s not, like this year.】

item.title: 尽管受到打压，但 Binance 仍将数百名员工留在新加坡
item.description: 全球最大的数字资产交易所 Binance 计划在新加坡保留数百名远程员工，尽管新加坡正在打击无牌加密货币机构。【原文：The world’s largest digital-assets exchange Binance plans to keep hundreds of remote workers in Singapore, despite a crackdown on unlicensed crypto outfits in the city-state.】

item.title: xAI 交易在最后一刻出现转折，摩根士丹利之外又多了几家银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，三家银行加入了摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为 xAI 公司进行的 50 亿美元债务交易，此前该公司要求它们参与其中，以保持关系，从而有助于下一步的融资。【原文：A trio of banks joined Morgan Stanley in a $5 billion debt deal for xAI Corp., after the company requested their participation to maintain relationships that could help with financings down the line, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Citgo 拍卖顾问建议黄金储备竞标
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，法院指定的顾问正准备推荐以 Gold Reserve Ltd. 为首的财团作为 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 母公司的最佳竞标者，法官将在未来几个月内做出最终决定。【原文：A court-appointed adviser is preparing to recommend a consortium led by Gold Reserve Ltd. as the best bidder for Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent company, according to people familiar with the matter, with a judge to make the final decision in the coming months.】

item.title: 墨西哥国会支持全面修订电信法规的法案
item.description: 墨西哥下议院批准了一项经过淡化的电信法规改革法案的总文本，此前该提案的初稿曾引发反对意见，认为政府试图审查批评性媒体。【原文：Mexico’s lower house approved the general text of a watered-down bill to overhaul telecommunications regulations, after the proposal’s initial draft provoked objections that the government was seeking to censor critical media.】

item.title: 贝索斯在今年首次出售中卸下 7.37 亿美元亚马逊股票
item.description: 杰夫-贝索斯最近几天出售了 330 万股亚马逊公司股票，净赚 7.367 亿美元。【原文：Jeff Bezos sold 3.3 million Amazon.com Inc. shares in recent days, netting $736.7 million.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 正在洽谈收购 Verint Systems
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 Thoma Bravo 正在洽谈收购呼叫中心软件制造商 Verint Systems Inc.【原文：Buyout firm Thoma Bravo is in talks to acquire Verint Systems Inc., a maker of call center software, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description:

item.title: 巴西贷款利率上升威胁拖拉机销售反弹
item.description: 巴西提高了农用设备融资利率，有可能制约拖拉机销售急需的复苏。【原文：Brazil has raised interest rates on farm equipment financing, threatening to constrain a much-needed recovery in tractor sales.】

item.title: 押注美债反弹延续面临就业数据的抉择
item.description: 最近几周迅速建立起国债多头头寸的债券交易员们指望周四的就业报告能给市场反弹带来更大的空间。【原文：Bond traders who rapidly built up long Treasuries positions in recent weeks are counting on Thursday’s jobs report to give the market rally more room to run.】

item.title: Figma 申请在美国上市，收入和利润均有增长
item.description: 设计软件公司 Figma Inc. 申请首次公开募股，这可能是本年度最大的首次公开募股之一。【原文：Design software business Figma Inc. filed for what could be one of the year’s biggest initial public offerings.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲业绩最好的国家秘鲁 2025 年前景恶化
item.description: 在令人失望的经济活动结果和全球动荡之后，秘鲁政府进一步下调了对 2025 年经济增长的预期。【原文：Peru’s government further cut its expectations for 2025 growth following disappointing economic activity results and global turbulence.】

item.title: 华为请求撤销美国贸易制裁案遭法官驳回
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.）明年必须在纽约接受刑事审判，因为联邦法官拒绝了这家中国无线设备制造商提出的撤销十多项指控的请求，其中包括敲诈勒索、窃取商业秘密和违反美国对伊朗的制裁。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. must face a criminal trial next year in New York after a federal judge refused a request by the Chinese wireless equipment maker to dismiss more than a dozen charges, including racketeering, trade secret theft and violating US sanctions on Iran.】
